name: unsuspecting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
trusting; not realizing there is any danger or harm: The killer lured his unsuspecting victims back to his apartment.

trusting; not aware of any danger or harm: The fish sometimes leap into the air and smack into unsuspecting boaters.
